name: SGR
description: '''SGR''' was an American [[ska-core]] band from Voorhees, New Jersey, United States, that formed as a five-piece act in 1996, during the United States third-wave ska boom. The band's catalog spans four albums (one released on cassette, three others on compact disc), a live recording, and a handful of compilation appearances.  The band's last live show took place in June 2007.
